pageTitle: AMERICAN ENERGY GROUP LTD (AEGG:OTC US): Stock Quote & Company Profile - Businessweek
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {9801=On 11/14/2014, The American Energy Group, Ltd. announced that they will be unable to file their next 10-Q by the deadline required by the SEC., 4830=The American Energy Group, Ltd. operates as an energy resource royalty company. It holds a non-producing 18% gross production interest in the Yasin 2768-7 block in Pakistan; and two oil and gas leases in Galveston County, Texas. The company also holds a 2.5% working interest in oil and gas production acreage in Sanjawi Block located in Baluchistan Province and in Zamzama North Block located in Sindh Province, Pakistan. The company was formerly known as Belize-American Corp. Internationale and changed its name to The American Energy Group, Ltd. in November 1994. The American Energy Group, Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Westport, Connecticut., 8829=On 05/15/2015, The American Energy Group, Ltd. announced that they will be unable to file their next 10-Q by the deadline required by the SEC., 9315=On 02/12/2015, The American Energy Group, Ltd. announced that they will be unable to file their next 10-Q by the deadline required by the SEC.}
